providers.title: UCloud
providers.description: Interactive digital research environment built to support the needs of researchers for both computing and data management, throughout all the data life cycle.

texts.description:
# Interactive HPC
The interactive HPC cluster consists of 90 nodes, with a total of 2896 cores and 37 TB of memory.
There are also a few Nvidia V100 and A100 graphical processing units for accelerating certain workloads.
 The theoretical peak performance is around 118 teraflops.

### Nodes
- Dell PowerEdge C6420
- 384/768 GB DDR 4-2666
- 2x Intel Xeon Gold 6130 16-Core @ 2.10GHz

providers.title: Hippo
providers.description: The DeiC Large Memory HPC system is a small system consisting of large memory nodes (between 1 and 4 TB RAM per node) configured as a traditional Slurm cluster. The system is hosted and maintained by the eScience Center at the University of Southern Denmark

texts.description:
# Large Memory HPC
The large memory HPC system is a small and specialised four-node system where each node is equipped with 4 TB of memory and 128 cores.
The system is used for workloads that cannot easily be parallelised and distributed across multiple nodes.

### Nodes
- Lenovo ThinkSystem SR645
- 4096 GB DDR4-2400 LRDIMM
- 2x AMD EPYC 7742 64-Core @ 2.25 GHz
